languages.text: Whenever the Arch-Militant or their ally uses a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} or a {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g}, the Arch-Militant gains +1 and +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} on all attacks until the end of combat.
languages.original_text: Когда архмилитант или его союзники используют {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героический акт{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}отчаянные меры{/g}, архмилитант до конца боя всеми атаками наносит на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} больше, а также еще +10% урона дополнительно.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the Veteran or their ally uses a heroic act or a desperate measure, the Veteran gains +2 damage for all attacks until the end of combat.

Whenever the Arch-Militant or their ally uses a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} or a {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g}, the Arch-Militant gains +1 and +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} on all attacks until the end of combat.

Whenever the Arch-Militant or their ally uses a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} or a {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g}, the Arch-Militant gains +1 and +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} on all attacks until the end of combat.

Whenever the Arch-Militant or their ally uses a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} or a {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g}, the Arch-Militant gains +1 and +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} on all attacks until the end of combat.

languages.text: 每当首席战士或盟友使用{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}背水一战{/g}后，首席战士所有攻击都会额外造成10%+1点{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: Whenever the Arch-Militant or their ally uses a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} or a {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g}, the Arch-Militant gains +1 and +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} on all attacks until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 每当首席战士或盟友使用{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}背水一战{/g}后，首席战士所有攻击都会额外造成10%+1点{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: Cuando el Archimilitante o un aliado usa un {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} o una {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}medida desesperada{/g}, el Archimilitante gana +1 y +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} para todos los ataques hasta el final del combate.
languages.original_text: Whenever the Arch-Militant or their ally uses a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} or a {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g}, the Arch-Militant gains +1 and +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} on all attacks until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el Archimilitante o un aliado usa un {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} o una {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}medida desesperada{/g}, el Archimilitante gana +2 de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} para todos los ataques hasta el final del combate.

languages.text: アーク・ミリタントまたは味方が{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}や{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}非常手段{/g}を使用すると、戦闘終了までアーク・ミリタントのすべての攻撃の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が+1と10%増加する。
languages.original_text: Whenever the Arch-Militant or their ally uses a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} or a {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g}, the Arch-Militant gains +1 and +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} on all attacks until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 古参（ベテラン）または味方が{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}や{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}苦肉の策{/g}を使用すると、戦闘終了まで退役軍人のすべての攻撃のダメージが+2増加する。

languages.text: Когда архмилитант или его союзники используют {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героический акт{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}отчаянные меры{/g}, архмилитант до конца боя всеми атаками наносит на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} больше, а также еще +10% урона дополнительно.
languages.original_text: Whenever the Arch-Militant or their ally uses a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} or a {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g}, the Arch-Militant gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for all attacks and additionally +10% damage until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Когда ветеран или его союзники используют {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героический акт{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}отчаянные меры{/g}, ветеран наносит на 2 урона больше всеми атаками до конца боя.

Когда ветеран или его союзники используют {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героический акт{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}отчаянные меры{/g}, ветеран наносит на 2 урона больше всеми атаками до конца боя.

languages.text: Wenn der Erzmilitant oder einer seiner Verbündeten eine {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Verzweiflungstat{/g} einsetzt, erhält der Erzmilitant bis zum Ende des Kampfes +1 und +10 % {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} für alle Angriffe.
languages.original_text: Whenever the Arch-Militant or their ally uses a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} or a {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g}, the Arch-Militant gains +1 and +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} on all attacks until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn der Erzmilitant oder einer seiner Verbündeten eine {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Verzweiflungstat{/g} einsetzt, erhält der Erzmilitant bis zum Ende des Kampfes +2 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} für alle Angriffe.

languages.text: Lorsque l'archimilitant ou son allié utilise un {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g} ou une {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}mesure désespérée{/g}, il bénéficie de +1 point et +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} pour toutes ses attaques jusqu'à la fin du combat.
languages.original_text: Whenever the Arch-Militant or their ally uses a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} or a {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g}, the Arch-Militant gains +1 and +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} on all attacks until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque le Vétéran ou son allié utilise un {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g} ou une {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}mesure désespérée{/g}, il bénéficie de +2 points de dégâts pour toutes ses attaques jusqu'à la fin du combat.
